services.title: Our Services
services.storage_description: If needed, we provide storage space for you. No matter the duration, our modular spaces adapt to your needs.
services.cleaning_description: We offer on-demand cleaning services. Focus on what really matters to you, and we make sure your living space remains welcoming and clean.
services.parking_description: Parking spaces are available in limited quantity, so don't hesitate to reserve yours.

booking.thank_you_message: We will get back to you within 3 business days.

q1.title: Who is coliving for?
q1.answer: Coliving is for those who enjoy living with others and being part of a community. The average age of our residents is between 24 and 36 years, but the mindset and love for communal living are what really matter.

q2.title: What is the minimum stay duration?
q2.answer: There is no minimum stay duration. Although most of our residents stay for several months, weekly or weekend stays are also available.

q3.title: Are there options for couples?
q3.answer: Living as a couple in a coliving house is an enriching experience. Some of our rooms are available for double occupancy.

q4.title: Can I register my residential address at your coliving?
q4.answer: Yes, you can register your residential address at our facility and receive mail here. However, registration can only be done after your move-in date.

q5.title: Can I bring a pet?
q5.answer: No, unfortunately, we cannot accept pets in the building due to space constraints, allergies, and cleanliness reasons.

hero.title: Our Storage Spaces for Rent
hero.description: Storage space rental. Whether you simply want to gain some space in your basement or store equipment, we will surely find the optimal solution.

m.space_for: 30 boxes, sofa, armchair, TV, wardrobe, bed, 4 chairs, table

xl.space_for: 80 boxes, sofa, armchair, TV, 2 wardrobes, bed, 6 chairs, table, 2 children's rooms, office, cellar

cta.title: Other solutions on request
cta.description: Contact us now to reserve your storage space or get more information.

q1.question: What is the minimum rental period?
q1.answer: There is no minimum duration. You can rent your space for a week, a month, or longer depending on your needs.

q2.question: Are the spaces secure?
q2.answer: Yes, all our storage spaces are secured with a controlled access system and 24/7 surveillance.

q3.question: Can I access my storage at any time?
q3.answer: Yes, you can access your storage space 7 days a week.
